fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An opinion article erred when it said the Daily Mail had been censured 50 times by the Independent Press Standards Organisation in 2017 and was the worst offender that year. The correct figure for adjudicated complaints upheld by Ipso against the Daily Mail newspaper was three, and it was not the worst offender (The bullies are all around us - not just online, 4 November, page 5, Journal). • Other recently corrected articles include: BAT faces landmark legal case over Malawi families’ poverty wages Rees-Mogg sorry for saying Grenfell victims lacked common sense Let battle commence: how the parties are shaping up for December’s election Asean summit: US condemns Chinese ‘intimidation’ in the South China Sea
